title: 💬 C&C Discord -- [Information & Verification]
body:
Hey there, Concepts & Creations!

Since it seemed to be a popular idea, we've made a Discord for this community! Here's the link: https://discord.gg/AXGAset

To verify yourself and gain access to the Discord, Post your Unique ID provided by Orion Bot once you join the server inside of the **#Verification** room.  After, type /verify with the permalink to your comment in the #verification room. Orion Bot should automatically verify you if you follow the process.

Make sure to follow the rules as this feature is a privilege and will be removed if abused.

_**Server Rules**_
1. Always be respectful. Harassment and insults will not be tolerated.
2. Do not spam. Please.
3. This is a privilege and any abuse will result in a ban from using this service.
4. Follow the [Universal Rules](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules).
5. This is not a place to air grievances about board moderation. Questions or concerns about board-related punishments or moderation questions should be addressed to the Board Feedback board, or on the [official board discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/qVlculPP-boards-moderation-discord).

Looking forward to talking to you all (and maybe catching a game or two) there!

-_**The Archivist Team**_

[](http://streamersquare.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Discord-Feature-Graphic.png)

replies.body:
Dragonheart #9842

Also ... the C&C Wardens are called Archivists, right?  Or does C&C not have a Warden?  In that case, I'd be happy to help out.

We have the same moderation powers as Wardens, yeah.

We're not currently open for new volunteers, both here and across the board. If you're interested, then stay active in the community and stay positive, and if the need arises, you should be set to apply.

His q is mirr q is that it attracts to the enemy and for two seconds it da shield his w is that it is that tureta will be brother by 20 percent less its e is that mirr marks the champion and kills him so it adds mirr 100hp ulti mirr  begins to teleport to the enemy, and 3 times to hit it and 3 da to the most damage.
Often the bots is too strong in tft. Sometimes nobody has golden heroes yet but bots have 2 or 3, this isn't fair play. :/

I have had an idea for a new game mode for a while, and I figured I might as well email you guys in hopes that you would one day add it. The mode would be where we get to use champs designs before they were reworked, for nostalgic reasons. Such as old yorick, galio, ryze, aatrox, etc. Please consider this as i think it could be a really enjoyable mode .
